snippet.title: The Cub (Demagog Studio) // The Mini Indie Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
The Jungle Book meets the armageddon. A story-rich, old-school tough platformer inspired by SEGA classics but built for today. Platform parkour through the remains of humanity as smooth apocalypse-wave tunes and stories reveal more.

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1941410/The_Cub/

The Mini Indie Showcase 2023: https://youtu.be/ANsVkLxB3e0 

Learn more: https://sixoneindie.com/showcase
---------

https://youtube.com/sixoneindie

Six One Indie is an independently operated games organization dedicated to amplifying indie creators of all shapes and sizes.
